personal.name: Mwafaq N. Abu-Shanab
personal.title: Founder of MA Loom — The Flow Studio
personal.tagline: From chaos to cadence. Workflows that adapt.
personal.bio:
MA Loom is a founder-led flow studio. We weave people, process, and platforms into an operating rhythm—blending Agile practice, automation, and pragmatic AI—to reduce cycle time, cut cost, and scale outcomes.

We turn scattered tools and meetings into one delivery rhythm—so your team ships value every week. From chaos to cadence, we design, automate, and deliver workflows that adapt.

Beyond work, I'm a proud father of four (including triplets!) and fluent in multiple languages, which helps me connect with diverse teams and clients worldwide.

services.title: Design. Automate. Deliver.
services.description: We design change-ready workflows that ship faster, safer, and smarter.
features: LoomMap workshops to diagnose delivery bottlenecks
Workflow automation with n8n, Python, and API integrations
Pragmatic AI deployments for business operations

services.title: Flow & Rhythm Consulting
services.description: We weave teams into a sustainable delivery cadence with proven methodologies.
features: Operating rhythm design and cadence optimization
SAFe / Scrum coaching with flow metrics

services.title: Product Strategy & Ventures
services.description: From concept to launch - strategic guidance for your next big idea.

ventures.name: Al-Noman Foundation
ventures.description: Non-profit organization dedicated to humanitarian aid and community development across multiple regions.

ventures.name: Nom Nom Cookies
ventures.description: Cookie & milk pairing franchise concept bringing gourmet cookie experiences to communities.

ventures.name: Lokio
ventures.description: Smart locksmith application connecting customers with verified locksmith professionals.

ventures.name: Rise MAgile
ventures.description: Story-pointing tool for Agile teams to improve estimation accuracy and velocity.

ventures.name: 7URyeah Studio
ventures.description: Freedom concept store & collectibles platform for unique lifestyle products.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.title: CTO, TechFlow Solutions
testimonials.content: MA Loom transformed our chaotic development process into a well-oiled machine. We went from 6-week sprints to 2-week deliveries with 40% fewer bugs. The automation workflows they built saved us 15 hours per week.

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Operations Director, Global Manufacturing Inc
testimonials.content: The workflow optimization and agile transformation delivered immediate results. Our time-to-market improved by 50%, and team satisfaction scores increased dramatically. Mwafaq's approach is both practical and transformative.

testimonials.name: Dr. Priya Patel
testimonials.title: Chief Innovation Officer, HealthTech Solutions
testimonials.content: Working with MA Loom was a game-changer for our product development. The LoomMap workshops identified bottlenecks we didn't even know existed. Now we ship features that actually solve real problems.
testimonials.results: 3x improvement in feature adoption, 60% faster releases

caseStudies.title: SaaS Platform Automation
caseStudies.challenge: Manual deployment processes taking 3 days, high error rates, team burnout
caseStudies.solution: Implemented CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and monitoring workflows

caseStudies.title: Enterprise Agile Transformation
caseStudies.challenge: Siloed departments, 9-month product cycles, poor communication
caseStudies.solution: SAFe implementation, cross-functional teams, flow metrics dashboard
